sentences.sContent: Julia: What can you do in Toronto?
sentences.sCn: 朱莉娅：在多伦多能玩些什么？

sentences.sContent: About 830 people on Facebook have replied they would attend the event in Toronto.
sentences.sCn: 大约有830人在脸书上回覆称他们会参与这个多伦多的活动。

sentences.sContent: That’s why our customers come in often, ” the Toronto store manager said.
sentences.sCn: 这就是为什么我们的顾客会经常光顾，”多伦多的店面经理说。
